Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan after convincing win over Bangladesh and Sri Lanka, Confidence of Afghanistan become high with having 4 points where as Sri Lanka won the first game of the series very convincingly and they would certainly want to win this game.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz (wk) looking to be in decent touch coming into the game. He has scored 132 runs in last 5 matches.
Kusal Mendis (wk) amazing batsman who can keep the scoreboard moving with his skills along with his performance on the field that should be seen in this fixture.
Najibullah Zadran have been in fine shape in the recent matches in shorter formats. He has scored 43 runs in just 17 balls at strike rate of 252.94.
Hazratullah Zazai is opener for his team and he would definitely be really good start. He has scored 111 runs in last 5 matches.
Ibrahim Zadran has scored a good number of runs in last match, He has scored 42 runs in just 41 balls at strike rate of 102.44.
Bhanuka Rajapaksa hasn’t perform well in previous matches but we believe that he had a great potential.
Danushka Gunathilaka Plays in second down position, past couple of match he was not gave her best.
Pathum Nissanka will be the opener of Sri Lanka team and will carry a huge responsibility in this game. He has scored 50 runs in last 5 matches
Charith Asalanka is looking to make amends for his no show in previous match.
Mohammad Nabi (c), With not much to be happy about so far, due to the below-average performance.
Karim Janat is a allrounder for this Afghanistan squad, He is average player and has pick 3 wicket in last 5 matches.
Chamika Karunaratne has picked a couple of wickets in last match.
Wanindu Hasaranga is classic player providing balance to his team and he has pick 4 wicket in last 5 matches.
Dasun Shanaka (c) has a great capability in batting than bowling. He has scored 45 runs in just 33 balls at strike rate of 136.36.
Mujeeb will guaranteed to pick up 2 +wickets in every game. He has looked ominous with 9 wickets in last 5 matches.
Fazalhaq Farooqi is one of the most promising bowlers, He has pick 6 wicket in last 5 matches.
Rashid Khan picked 3 wickets in last match at an economy of 5.50.
Naveen-ul-Haq is a decent bowler and has fail to pick wicket in last match.
Dilshan Madushanka bowl 4 over at upfront and pick 1 wicket in last match.
M Theekshana bowls at upfront ang he has pick 5 wicket in last 5 matches.
